bs-smartlist-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of smart list extension
prefs-smartlist:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for smart list section in preferences.
{{Identical|Smart list}}
bs-smartlist-recent-changes:
Headline of recent changes list
{{Identical|Recent changes}}
bs-smartlist-no-entries: Text message that no entries were found.
bs-smartlist-invalid-namespaces:
Error message that one or more of the given namespaces are invalid.
* $1 is the number of invalid namespaces - use for PLURAL distinction
* $2 is the invalid namespace or a comma-separated list of invalid namespaces
bs-smartlist-invalid-target: Error message that the given target parameter is not a valid page title.
bs-smartlist-sort-asc:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for acsending
{{Identical|Ascending}}
bs-smartlist-sort-desc:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for descending
{{Identical|Descending}}
bs-smartlist-day:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for day
{{Identical|Day}}
bs-smartlist-week:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for week
{{Identical|Week}}
bs-smartlist-month:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for month
{{Identical|Month}}
bs-smartlist-time:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for time
{{Identical|Time}}
bs-smartlist-title:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for title
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-smartlist-mosteditedpages: Used in [[Special:AdminDashboard]] and [[Special:UserDashboard]], headline for most edited pages
bs-smartlist-mostactiveusers: Used in [[Special:AdminDashboard]] and [[Special:UserDashboard]], headline for most active users (by edits)
bs-smartlist-lastedits: Used in [[Special:AdminDashboard]] and [[Special:UserDashboard]], headline for my edits
bs-smartlist-noedits: Text message for no edits found.
bs-smartlist-mostactiveusersdesc: Used in [[Special:AdminDashboard]] and [[Special:UserDashboard]], text message for list of most active users sorted by their edits.
bs-smartlist-mosteditedpagesdesc: Used in [[Special:AdminDashboard]] and [[Special:UserDashboard]], text message for list of most edited pages sorted by their edits.
bs-smartlist-mostvisitedpagesdesc: Used in [[Special:AdminDashboard]] and [[Special:UserDashboard]], text message for list of most viewed pages sorted by their views.
bs-smartlist-lasteditsdesc: Used in [[Special:AdminDashboard]] and [[Special:UserDashboard]], text message for list of pages which you have edited.
bs-smartlist-hitcounter-missing: Error and link to extension page when HitCounters is missing. Used on Users Dashboard Widget of SmartList Extension, most visited pages
bs-smartlist-ve-userlist-title: Title for userlist inspector to set groups
bs-smartlist-ve-userlistinspector-groups: Label for input field to set groups
bs-smartlist-ve-userlistinspector-limit: Label for input field to set limit to shown results
bs-smartlist-ve-userlistinspector-no-use: Label if no users are available in selected group
bs-smartlist-ve-userlistinspector-no-gro: Label if no group is selected
bs-smartlist-droplet-userlist-name: Title of droplet for tag userlist
bs-smartlist-droplet-userlist-desc: Description of droplet for tag userlist
bs-smartlist-droplet-newbies-name: Title of droplet for tag newbies
bs-smartlist-droplet-newbies-desc: Description of droplet for tag newbies
bs-smartlist-droplet-recent-changes-name: Title of droplet for template recent changes
bs-smartlist-droplet-recent-changes-desc: Description of droplet for template recent changes
bs-smartlist-droplet-toplist-name: Title of droplet for tag toplist
bs-smartlist-droplet-toplist-desc: Description of droplet for tag toplist
bs-smartlist-droplet-what-links-here-nam: Title of droplet for template what links here
bs-smartlist-droplet-what-links-here-des: Description of droplet for template what links here
bs-smartlist-ve-whatlinkshere-title: Title for what links here inspector
bs-smartlist-error-mode-not-found: Error shown if smartlist is passed a mode that doesn't exist
